data.name: Hack In Paris 2020
data.location: Maison de la Chimie (75007 Paris - FRANCE)
data.description:
Hack In Paris, the IT security event, will be held for the ninth time in France, at the La Maison de la Chimie. Hack In
Paris attendees will discover the realities of hacking, and its consequences for companies by offering 3 days- trainings
and 2 days-conferences.
